alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:20AM CDT until May 19 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 320 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Manchester to 7 miles northeast of Wakita to Renfrow to near Nardin to near Blackwell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wellington, Caldwell, Oxford, Argonia, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Mayfield, Milan, Hunnewell and Perth. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
